text: Monte Carlo is the largest quarter in Monaco. Its area is , and around four hundred people live there. ==Overview== Monte Carlo is also the centre of gambling, politics, fireworks and culture. Monte Carlo has a lot of casinos, hotels and historical buildings. Monte Carlo is one of Europe's leading tourist resorts. Within the casino complex is the Grand Théâtre de Monte Carlo, the Opéra de Monte-Carlo and ballet house, and the headquarters of the Ballets de Monte Carlo. ==References==
title: Monte Carlo
